content.content:
CREATE TABLE drivers
(
    driverId    INTEGER
        primary key autoincrement,
    driverRef   TEXT default '' not null,
    number      INTEGER,
    code        TEXT,
    forename    TEXT default '' not null,
    surname     TEXT default '' not null,
    dob         DATE,
    nationality TEXT,
    url         TEXT default '' not null
        unique
);

tool_use_result.stdout:
CREATE TABLE drivers
(
    driverId    INTEGER
        primary key autoincrement,
    driverRef   TEXT default '' not null,
    number      INTEGER,
    code        TEXT,
    forename    TEXT default '' not null,
    surname     TEXT default '' not null,
    dob         DATE,
    nationality TEXT,
    url         TEXT default '' not null
        unique
);

content.content:
CREATE TABLE driverStandings
(
    driverStandingsId INTEGER
        primary key autoincrement,
    raceId            INTEGER default 0 not null,
    driverId          INTEGER default 0 not null,
    points            REAL   default 0 not null,
    position          INTEGER,
    positionText      TEXT,
    wins              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    foreign key (raceId) references races(raceId),
    foreign key (driverId) references drivers(driverId)
);

(

        primary key autoincrement,

    driverId        INTEGER default 0  not null,
    constructorId   INTEGER default 0  not null,
    number          INTEGER,

    positionText    TEXT    default '' not null,

    fastestLapSpeed TEXT,
    statusId        INTEGER default 0  not null,
    foreign key (raceId) references races(raceId),

    foreign key (statusId) references status(statusId)
);

content.text: Now let me query for Michael Schumacher's maximum points total. Based on the hint, "maximum points total" likely refers to `MAX(points)` from the `driverStandings` table (which tracks cumulative standings points).

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/formula_1.sqlite" "SELECT d.forename, d.surname, MAX(ds.points) as max_points FROM drivers d JOIN driverStandings ds ON d.driverId = ds.driverId WHERE d.forename = 'Michael' AND d.surname = 'Schumacher';"
input.description: Get Michael Schumacher's max points from driverStandings

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/formula_1.sqlite" "SELECT d.forename, d.surname, MAX(r.points) as max_points FROM drivers d JOIN results r ON d.driverId = r.driverId WHERE d.forename = 'Michael' AND d.surname = 'Schumacher';"
input.description: Get Michael Schumacher's max points from results
